home.title: Emanuel Tapia

home.description_1: I’m a software developer with a preference for remote work.

jobs.title: Current Job - Terra
jobs.description: Lead and owner of the Frontend for the Web Dashboard project (React: architecture, components, UI/UX) | Unit tests with Vitest | REST API integration and development | Secure SQL scripts for production, data flows across related tables | HTTP error handling, validations and troubleshooting | Mobile UI: connection/error handling and UI design | Website maintenance and CSS styling | XML/XSLT processing.

jobs.title: iHunt
jobs.description: Frontend development for the website | User flow and interaction design (UX) | Backend development for web applications | Server and database setup/configuration | Cross-platform and responsive optimization for mobile | Technical documentation | Technical support for organizational and client requirements | Test plan design and implementation.

jobs.title: AppCar
jobs.description: Frontend development for the website | User flow and interaction design (UX) | Technical documentation | Test plan design and implementation | APK generation for mobile app testing | Task management and distribution using Zoho.

jobs.title: Valkiria
jobs.description: Frontend development for the website | SQL tables and query development | JavaScript function development | SQL stored procedure development | Database integration from C# | Bulk data uploads via Excel.

section.title: Profile
section.description_1: Computer Engineer and Software Developer with experience in building both web and mobile applications, covering front-end and back-end development.
section.description_2: I have participated in projects for various companies, contributing to interface design, data processing, API consumption from the frontend, development of efficient queries, stored procedures, and database structures.
section.description_3: I am known for being energetic, proactive, and passionate about delivering my best in every project I take on.
section.description_4: I have a strong ability to work in teams, with a high level of adaptability to changes and new challenges, both professional and personal.

section.title: Soft Skills
section.description_4: High/advanced level of spoken and written English.

section.title: Education
section.description: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering, INACAP University (2017-2021).
